definition: to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)

sentences.english: If the cargoes cannot be found within a few days, we will file our claim for the full settlement of them.
sentences.chinese: 若數日內貨物不能運到，我們就提出全額清償索賠。

sentences.english: Debt is always liquidated. The only question is how you liquidate debt.
sentences.chinese: 債務總會被清償，唯一的問題是你會怎樣償還。
第一百零八條債務應當清償。

sentences.english: Sustained efforts to improve credit and collateral registries offer large pay-offs.
sentences.chinese: 持續努力的改善信用狀況和抵押登記有助於清償債務。

sentences.english: Though the Plaintiff has repeatedly demanded the payment, the Defendant fails to liquidate the outstanding debts in due time.
sentences.chinese: 儘管原告多次催討貨款，被告仍未能清償到期債務。

sentences.english: People who owe comparatively large amount of debt which is overdue.
sentences.chinese: 個人所負數額較大的債務到期未清償的。

sentences.english: Please settle this long outstanding account without further delay.
sentences.chinese: 請清償這筆長期未清的賬目，勿再拖延。

sentences.english: With a bare bodkin? Who would fardels bear.
sentences.chinese: 就能清償宿債？誰甘心揹負重擔。

sentences.english: The settlement agreement shall stipulate the period in which the enterprise shall repay the debts.
sentences.chinese: 和解協議應當規定企業清償債務的期限。

sentences.english: You must pay off your solution before securing another loan.
sentences.chinese: 你在借款作保前，必須清償整所有債務。

sentences.english: I'll pay off my debt with this check.
sentences.chinese: 我將用這張支票清償欠債。

sentences.english: The government made every effort to stabilize the economy by -ting the national debt.
sentences.chinese: 政府以清償國家債務力謀穩定經濟。

sentences.english: Unable to meet debts or discharge liabilities; bankrupt.
sentences.chinese: 清償國家債務力謀穩定經濟。

sentences.english: This process of corporate debt restructuring or outright liquidation may take years.
sentences.chinese: 這一企業債務重組或全部清償的過程或許要歷時數年。

sentences.english: That's just a drop in the bucket . I need too much to get back on my feet.
sentences.chinese: 那只是杯水車薪，我需要一大筆錢來清償債務。
第一百零八條債務應當清償。

definition: to recover (stolen property)/to pursue and force sb to give back the spoils
to bear joint responsibility for sth/joint liability (law)
environmental impact assessment EIA/abbr. to 環評|环评
pinyin: huan2 jing4 ying3 xiang3 ping2 gu1

definition: to lend money (for interest)/to give credit
